duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide pediatric dental care including pedodontics, orthodontics, laser surgery, and conscious sedation.
Deliver outpatient care in a child-friendly environment, ensuring positive patient experiences.
Collaborate with dedicated staff to promote associate work-life balance and support positive patient experiences.
Participate in referral programs and community education initiatives to support the growth of the practice.
Provide comprehensive training to build expertise within the innovative organization.

education_certification.credential: DDS or DMD from an accredited dental school
Certification in Pediatric Dentistry or Orthodontics
